name: Hy Brayil
description:
Prove yourself to the ancient spirits and unleash the power of the sacred runes.




Hi there, we are the Urutau games team.
Hy Brayil was developed in an internal game jam at the end of 2020, an excuse to produce a small game that was fun and allowed us to explore a different gameplay and a new artistic style.
We ended up getting attached to the project and from now on it will receive some updates, bug fixes, new runes and more powerful enemies.
We thank everyone who was willing to play our project.
